ygData.subject: Re: Debit Card info
ygData.msgSnippet: some local debit cards does NoT allow for online purchases. They must be phycial swap thru the machine to verify bal in Bank. I think OUB allows for on-line
ygData.messageBody:
some local debit cards does NoT allow for online purchases. They must be
phycial swap thru the machine to verify bal in Bank.
I think OUB allows for on-line purchases.no sure.
Be prepare to wait up to 4weeks for approval as demand is Hot.

yiyang

-----Original Message-----
From: Ebon Praetor <kelc@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>; < DaNNY > <sci60553@...>
Date: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 2:55 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Debit Card info


>From: "Ebon Praetor" <kelc@...>
>
>For all of you who are worried about the credit card requirement of
>EQ, here is some information I dug up from local bank websites...
>
>http://www.uob.com.sg/fr_mn_srh.htm
>http://www.oub.com.sg/creditcard/index_debit.html
>
>Apparently, DBS/POSB, despite being the "biggest" bank in
>Singapore, has a website that does not give any information on
>their debit card, or any way to easily search for that information.
>
>One would be inclined to believe they lack this service altogether...
>
>
>P.S: I hope you don't mind, Danny; I posted to you and the local
>EQ mailing list at the same time.
>
>
>--
>
>
>Love is in the air...
>Get me a gas mask, quick!!!
>
>Cya,
